```{bash }
#| label: variant-calling-init-data
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
mkdir -p fastqc bam gatk-hc-raw \
    gatk-hc-bqsr gatk-bqsr gatk-filter-raw \
    gatk-filter-bqsr gatk-combine-gvcf \
    gatk-genotype-gvcf md qualimap
fastqc -o fastqc fastq/*PUN-Y-INJ*.fastq.gz > /dev/null 2>&1
if [ ! -e fastqc/PUN-Y-INJ_R1_fastqc ]; then
    unzip fastqc/PUN-Y-INJ_R1_fastqc.zip -d fastqc > /dev/null 2>&1
fi
if [ ! -e fastqc/PUN-Y-INJ_R2_fastqc ]; then
    unzip fastqc/PUN-Y-INJ_R2_fastqc.zip -d fastqc > /dev/null 2>&1
fi
```
